body_html:
I managed to build tensorflow statically.

  • add tensorflow/c/c_api.cc \ above that line
  • add #define __ANDROID__ 1 in tensorflow/c/c_api.cc on the top to skip files that's missing header files
  • run ./tensorflow/contrib/makefile/build_all_linux.sh

works for me on Ubuntu Artful and MacOS High Sierra.
body_text:
I managed to build tensorflow statically.

add tensorflow/c/c_api.cc \ above that line
add #define __ANDROID__ 1 in tensorflow/c/c_api.cc on the top to skip files that's missing header files
run ./tensorflow/contrib/makefile/build_all_linux.sh

works for me on Ubuntu Artful and MacOS High Sierra.
body:
I managed to build tensorflow statically.
- add `tensorflow/c/c_api.cc \` above [that](https://github.com/tensorflow/tensorflow/blob/master/tensorflow/contrib/makefile/Makefile#L534) line
- add `#define __ANDROID__ 1` in `tensorflow/c/c_api.cc` on the top to skip files that's missing header files
- run ./tensorflow/contrib/makefile/build_all_linux.sh

works for me on Ubuntu Artful and MacOS High Sierra.
